displaymath:
\begin{displaymath}
\left( \begin{array}{cc} a & b \\ c & d \end{array} \right)
\otimes  \left( \begin{array}{cc} \alpha & \beta  \\ \gamma & \delta
\end{array} \right)  \mapsto \left( \begin{array}{cccc} a\alpha & a\beta &
b\alpha & b\beta \\ a\gamma & a\delta & b\gamma & b\delta \\ c\alpha & c\beta &
d\alpha & d\beta \\ c\gamma & c\delta & d\gamma & d\delta \end{array}
\right)
\
